title: Brainwashed
description: While sleeping on the roof of his father’s hotel, thirteen-year-old Lucas Benes finds a baby alone and learns that the Good Company has restarted its profitable kidnapping business. Brainwashed (Crime Travelers #1) tracks the secret urban adventures of the New Resistance, a network of international teenage spies. Headquartered in Las Vegas’s posh Globe Hotel, the New Resistance sends its Tier One kids to Paris on its biggest mission to date. Lucas leads a group of friends through the hotspots of Paris—from the catacombs to the Eiffel tower—in an all-out effort to sabotage a brainwashing ceremony that could potentially turn them all into “Good” kids. Brainwashed (Crime Travelers #1) is a realistic middle-grade action-packed book for boys and girls who are intrigued by mystery, conspiracy, and espionage. (And it’s for kids who know the difference between good and “good.”) Ages 10+
author: Paul Aertker
